description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the gluteus maximus.
description_ar: تمرين legs يركز على gluteus maximus.
instructions_en: Upper back against bench edge (at shoulder blade level)
Feet flat, hip-width apart, knees at 90 degrees at top
Drive through heels, squeeze glutes to lift
Full hip extension at top - SQUEEZE 1-2 seconds
tips_en: Arching lower back → Maintain posterior pelvic tilt
Pushing through toes → Drive through heels
Not reaching full extension → Squeeze glutes at top
Looking at ceiling → Keep chin tucked

description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the gluteus medius.
description_ar: تمرين legs يركز على gluteus medius.
instructions_en: Lie on side, legs straight and stacked
Lift top leg toward ceiling (30-45 degrees)
Keep hips stacked - don't rotate backward
tips_en: Rotating hips backward → Stack hips perpendicular to floor
Lifting too high → 30-45 degrees is enough
Leading with toe → Keep foot neutral or slightly heel-leading

description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the gluteus medius.
description_ar: تمرين legs يركز على gluteus medius.
instructions_en: Lie on side, knees bent 90 degrees, feet together
Rotate top knee open like a clamshell
Keep feet together, don't let hips roll back
Squeeze at top, lower with control
Add band above knees for resistance
